1_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz.body:
I started on Mint but didn't like the interface (I've never thought the bottom task/status bar setup utilizes widescreens. Same thing with tabs at the top, why not side bar tabs?!) and went DE shopping until I found GNOME shell.

Spent many happy years on GNOME with different distros as base, but found Ubuntu in it's various forms to suit me.
